Provakil | New Delhi, India | ONSITE | Full Time | https://provakil.com

Provakil sends alerts for court cases and helps lawyers manage their cases. We keep track of the cases through various public sources. We are looking for:

- Frontend Developer - iOS Developer - Android Developer -

Our stack currently includes Python, Node.js (using Sails.js framework), Backbone.js, MongoDB, Redis

We are bootstrapped, profitable and have paid customers who love our product. Our strong metrics helped us attend YC OOH 2016. We are still a small team, so you will have an opportunity to directly contribute to the success of the company.

Email us your resumes and queries at careers@provakil.com.
